author: gbrown
msg: Move integration tests to their own project.

author: bago
msg: Added test messages (from the MIME4J-58 issue) to show differences between malformedHeaderStartsBody set to true or false. Updated testsuite runners so that when a testmessage name starts with "malformedHeaderStartsBody" then the option is set to true before starting tests (we could do this to test other options too).
